ComicInfo.Summary:
Samara and the other prisoners who managed to survive the Pagurani attack on the T-Towers are stranded on the battlefield, but they’ll need to find a way to trust one another before they can hope to find a transport to safety. They just better hope it happens before their Punch clocks hit zero...
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Reg | Regular Cover | Damian Couceiro (a) & Jordan Boyd (c) | 1 | Var | 1:10 Variant Cover | Declan Shalvey (a) & Jordie Bellaire (c) | 3 | 2nd | Second Printing Cover | Damian Couceiro | 2 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-07-09 08:07:59. [CVDB481656]
